channel.title: Portafolio y otros proyectos on Alejandro Manzano
channel.description: Recent content in Portafolio y otros proyectos on Alejandro Manzano

item.title: Otra presentacion chida
item.description: Esta entrada en el portafolio no tiene subtitulo ni imagen, para que te des una idea de como se ve.

item.title: Presentaci√≥n de Archivo Transtorno
item.description: DERA leverages the intrinsic loose coupling of event-driven communication styles to support various kinds of run-time evolution and adaptation (i.e., enabling run-time flexibility) while minimizing the non-deterministic nature of traditional event-based applications (i.e., supporting formal analysis).

item.title: Tejiendo Relatos - Primer Grupo
item.description: This is a Java reference implementation of dynamic event-driven actors runtime aiming at providing adequate abstraction levels and mechanisms for modelling and developing (distributed) event-based systems.
